replies.body: scarra just gives so much helpful advice, not just about league but about life and I just learn so much from him

I started League August 2011 as my first (and only) MOBA. Part of the fascination I have had with League is watching the whole esports scene develop.Those early years tours of a team house- all I could think was 'man, these guys need a den mother to make sure they eat right'. I am glad to see that an infrastructure is developing to support the players- although there has also been an increase in players being interchangeable parts, they certainly aren't the ones running the show anymore. As for player longevity, I think Jatt should take into account not only decreased reflex speed, but repetitive use injury. I am (way) older than the average player and it didn't take long for right hand, tricep, and shoulder pain to limit my play time. I briefly spoke to Scarra about  educating /helping players invest their earnings wisely- can pro players set up a SEP-IRA? Are they considered employees or private contractors or what?

Actually studies show that reflex times only increase **very** slowly until your early fifties, after that they increase markedly. So what Jatt says definitely holds true, but what your saying also holds true but at a much later age than what Jatt considered.

still- the 14 hours a day scarra was practicing cant be good for you- on top of being way too sedentary. At least old age and treachery will beat youth and exuberance ie game experience from objective control, lane swapping, champion synergy etc will compensate for slight differences in reflex time
Love listening to Scarra talk about his struggles. 5/7 podcast
i now have cancer
me too :D{{champion:6}}
rip mana pots :( for all those ap mages and ezreals mains  out there :(

I put this on at work, because it's Saturday, and all of my normal shows are on cooldown, so I thought, why not try it. I'm now 5 in a row deep, and I must say, I'm hard pressed to choose a favorite between hearing all of the insider tech talk with the QA/dev team, and the personal accounts from the professional players. The interviews with Scarra and Darshawn were eye opening; you always think of them as just "the pros," they never really seem human, in the same sense that it's hard to imagine Adele or Cam Newton being actual normal people, but hearing them talk about their experiences was awesome, it made them seem incredibly relatable.

This is a great series; I look forward to hearing more! Shout out to the host, you're doing an amazing job.
its always interesting to hear about the league scene from before my time. I didn't come around till the end of season 4
Gaming ability falling off as you get older? Are you kidding me dude? You're younger than I am (by like a month. Scarra confirmed tilted.
If you had actually listened to what we're talking about, you'd know it wasn't scarra that said or agreed to what i said. I was agreeing with jat
Scarra-senpai notice me, please! :3

Hi, I just wanted to ask is there any kind of player behavior system cause I'm getting real sick of being forced to surrender when we're only 20 minutes into the game and we're tied (I've been forced to surrender the last three matches because my team), also a suggestion for a player report options; I'd like to see a reporting option called "wrong lane" for the players that didn't call a lane or called it late but still try to take the place of whoever called the lane or position first, my most recent match (forced to surrender by the way) I called bottom "bot" but spelled it wrong cause I was in a hurry I spelled it "boit" and I was the first to call bottom (adc was taken)because I spelled it wrong I had three teammates all say they called bot, at the start of this match me and the appointed adc had three other bottom champions and no jg, mid or top. please add this report option.

you are caring to much. do whatever you want. try that. If you are playing norms then play any champ you feel like regardless of position. There is no rule about champ selection for a reason. How do you think meta changes. Someone took anne/morg/lux/zyra bot at some point when it was never done before. Or live your life at the whim of others in a "boit" world.
